Q7_W3. Summary Table: Thinking about what would benefit your local community, which of the following areas related to the physical environment do you think are most important?By 'local community' we mean the local area where you live.
Young people having places to go and things to do
Having access to natural, green spaces
Community activities that bring people together
Plenty of sports facilities and clubs for people to join
